list.description:
#wz305

CN-WZ305 Sight
Zoom : 1.9x - 3.5x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_wz_305

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_wz_305

#type59 #type69

CN-Type59 / Type69 Sight
Zoom : 3.5x - 7.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_type_59

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_type_59

Часть прицелов взята отсюда: https://live.warthunder.com/post/708194/ru/ и https://live.warthunder.com/post/682644/en/

Прицелы M105D, No. 30 и для M-51 взял отсюда: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1035654/en/

#furry #femboy #sight #alltanks #cute

Here's a sight of a femboy sylveon, I hope you all enjoy. Please make sure to comment what you want the next sight or skin to be.

#furry #cute #loona #alltanks #sight #female #wolf #hellhound

Heyo, here's a sight of Loona from Helluva Boss, hope you all enjoy, please leave suggestions in the comments so I know what to make next!

Short version of the M83C telescope found on the T26E5. Meant to be used with M82 shot
Not entirely accurate, edited slightly to be cleaner.

Updated for the new ballistic changes on M82 shot.

skp file included

#all_tanks #drg

#anime #all_tanks

mmmmmm fish


skp file included

You guys asked me to upload the sight, so here it is.
Blue is day sight.
Purple is "night sight" but I use it for snow maps.
I downloaded the original sight from CaveNub and then modified the file to fit my needs.

TO INSTALL IT,
use my Super Advanced Installing step system, which was created by using nanotechnology.
Installation tutorial can be found by scrolling through pictures, I put my heart and soul into it.
But I would advise you to seek for proper installation tutorial.
FOR STEAM FIND YOUR WarTinder folder and start from step 4-5

Universal B-21 Raider Sight

The sight IS meant to be used with MBTs, so keep that in mind when choosing to use this with certain tanks.

The text is edited a little, to fit WT's environment a little better and to suit a friend of mine (you know who you are).

Original can be found here: https://twitter.com/atamonica1/status/1703017012258345104

How to install
1. Extract the .zip with your method of choice
2. copy-paste the .blk file to your WT folder in whatever folder WT's installed in, steam included - War Thunder - Usersights - all_tanks

First time ...

#anime #bocchi #all_tanks

Me first user sight!

still have no clue what im doing but im doing

~K9 VIDAR FICTIONAL SIGHT~

Fictional thermal sight for the Norweigan K9 Vidar. The sight is from the same thermal device but probably installed on a drone, not the tank. Numbers and texts are purely cosmetic based on the images I found.

It is adjusted for WarThunder as always.

Leave feedback!

Sources/explanation/links: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit?usp=sharing

#fictional #sweden #norway #south_korea #k9 #k9_vidar #k9vidar #k9_thunder #k9thunder #vidar
a tank sight with the basic cat from Battle Cats on it. not much else to say.

NewJersey scope for all tanks.

The archive contains:

NewJersey_Small.blk (sight)
NewJersey_VeryBig.blk (sight)
NewJersey.skp (source, for editing)

#newjersey #azur_lane #anime #all_tanks

turns out it's broken... i'll fix it someday

~TOR M-1 HISTORICAL SIGHT~
Works for 4k, 1440p and 1080p

Realistic sight for the Tor-M1 in the chinese tech tree, adapted for WarThunder. There's also sights for the Tor M2 since those look better in my opinion.
I used the strv 103 and strv 104 to make the sight since they have the same zoom that the tor has.
Picture 1 and 2 are Tor M2, picture three is Tor M1 (empty screen)

Leave feedback!

Sources/explanation/links: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit?usp=shari...

当前版本：2.29.0.72这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】 由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】 此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.


Current version: 2.29.0.72 the original author of this set of custom sight is Zui fan. I just help update and optimize it because I haven't updated it for a long time. [the production of this set of sight is approved by the original author] as the sight scales of some top vehicles in the new version have changed, I have also made some optimization. [if you have any questions, please contact me at: 1745097470@qq.c...
simple universal Tank Sight with =ID10T= squadron branding.

So now that the hungarian tanks are FINALY out, I've decided to gradually make some sights for the rest.

A historical sight for the Turán 1

(if you need some explaination for what is what see my Toldi 2 post)

#turan_i #hungary #historical

Little wolf girl will always be there with u.

Modified from Cavenub's sight.

https://live.warthunder.com/post/1032504/en/

Currently the sight color is red (unlike in the screenshot), but u can easily change it by modifying 'crosshairColor:c' in the blk file.

Universal, but I removed the distance marks so not recommended to be used without laser rangefinder. Easy to add back though.

#sight #crosshair #anime #all_tanks #fictional #universal

~LOSAT SEMI HISTORICAL SIGHT~
Works in 4k, 1440p and 1080p
its a cctv camera..... that's why I added M2A3 sight

Almost historical sight for the Line-Of-Sight Ant-Tank Weapon (LOSAT). Tried to make it as realistic as possible but adjusted it for WarThunder. Please message me or leave a comment if you find a better picture/video of the sight.
I know it is a Sofradir 480 x 4 infrared FPA thermal device but I couldn't find a better picture than this.

The fire control system for the LOSAT is based on the Improved Bradley Acquisition Subsystem (IBAS) that is pre...
